General.Name: Fujikon Industrial Holdings Limited
General.Description: Fujikon Industrial Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, markets, and trades in electro-acoustic products, accessories, and other electronic products in Hong Kong and Mainland China. It offers wireless, active noise cancellation, acoustic, and digital signal processing headphones. The company is also involved in the manufacture and trade of precision metal parts and packaging materials; and property holding activities, as well as provision of management services. Fujikon Industrial Holdings Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Sha Tin, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Grand Central Plaza, Tower 1, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
